name: true-color
description: A tiny plugin which shows color of color value in your css file
readme:
# true-color package

A tiny plugin which shows color of color value in your css file

![](http://libcafe.com/test.gif)

# usage
In editor of a css file

```
cmd+alt+t
```

or

```
cmd+shift+p
```
and then type in "true color"
